Package org.dspace.app.xmlui.aspect.administrative.collection

Class Summary
AssignCollectionRoles Presents the user (most likely a global administrator) with the form to edit the collection's special authorization groups (or roles).
CreateCollectionForm Presents the user with a form to enter the initial metadata for creation of a new collection
DeleteCollectionConfirm Confirmation step for the deletion of an entire collection
DeleteCollectionRoleConfirm Confirmation step for the deletion a collection's role
EditCollectionHarvestingForm This is the other form that deals with harvesting.
EditCollectionMetadataForm Presents the user (in this case an administrator over the collection) with the form to edit that collection's metadata, logo, and item template.
SetupCollectionHarvestingForm Presents the user (in this case an administrator over the collection) with the form to edit that collection's metadata, logo, and item template.
ToggleCollectionHarvestingForm The form displayed for collections that do not have any harvesting settings active (i.e.
